channel.title: Neuroconductor on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel
channel.description: Recent content in Neuroconductor on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel

item.title: Software
item.description: MIMoSA The mimosa R package is now live on Neuroconductor. You can access the page directly here. For the most up to date version please see my GitHub here. To download from Neuroconductor run the following code: source("https://neuroconductor.org/neurocLite.R") neuro_install(mimosa, release = "stable", release_repo = latest_neuroc_release(release = release)) neuro_install(mimosa, release = "current", release_repo = latest_neuroc_release(release = release)) To download from GitHub run the following code: install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("avalcarcel9/mimosa") You can find documentation and a tutorial provided on my GitHub here.
